articles.author: Kim Tong-hyung
articles.title: North Korea displays apparent progress in construction of nuclear-powered submarine - AP News
articles.description: North Korea displayed apparent progress in the construction of a nuclear-powered submarine, with state media photos showing a largely completed hull as leader Kim Jong Un condemned rival South Korea’s push to acquire the technology. North Korea’s official Kor…
articles.content: SEOUL, South Korea (AP) North Korea on Thursday displayed apparent progress in the construction of a nuclear-powered submarine, with state media photos showing a largely completed hull, as leader Kim… [+5241 chars]
